vocabInfos.mediumDef:
Another spelling of lu.vi (לוּב "Libyan" H3864)
§ This name is used for:
1) the name of a people in alliance with Nebuchadnezzar and probably located in northern Africa; maybe same as 'Lybia' or 'Lub'
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
和尼布甲尼撒王結盟的一民族名, 可能位於北非;
可能等同於 'Lybia' 或 'Lub' (結30:5)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
和尼布甲尼撒王结盟的一民族名, 可能位于北非;
可能等同于 'Lybia' 或 'Lub' (结30:5)
